van_gogh.name: Vincent van Gogh

death.details: Ended his life at age 37 due to mental health issues and depression

facts: Only sold one painting during his lifetime
Had a close relationship with his brother Theo
Cut off part of his ear
Created over 850 paintings in his 10-year artistic career
His letters are considered among the most important documents in art history
